summary: Adds a new ward spell to throw random ice spikes that stagger opponents
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Da video son!
[youtube]TiFG_lvzVE4[/youtube]



As usual Discworld Trailers, where all these spells will be packed into one convienient esp
[youtube]FEBNe8XINd0[/youtube]

[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]
[/center]



Adds a new spell tome near Bleak Falls Barrow
Spell is a ward that has Lesser ward propertys as well as the Foxfire Effect
Foxfire adds ice spikes that rotate above the player
Foxfire will ONLY hit combatants who are IN COMBAT with the player
Will not effect non hostiles
Will not effect Hostiles who are not in combat with the player
Ice spikes do normal damage not modified by any perks skills etc
Lesser ward is boosted with restoration perks skills etc as far as damage mitigation spell cost etcÂ
author: darren83
